channel.title: CVE Feed for israelb1 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for israelb1 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1205|2024-08-05T14:58:40.855Z -- israelb1 -- management%20app%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20order%20notifications%2C%20order%20management%2C%20lead%20management%2C%20uptime%20monitoring
item.description: The Management App for WooCommerce – Order notifications, Order management, Lead management, Uptime Monitoring plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the nouvello_upload_csv_file function in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.
